title: Check if String is Numeric
description: This function checks whether the input string consists solely of numeric characters. It iterates through each character of the input string and verifies if it is a number. If any character is found to be non-numeric, the function returns false. If all characters are numeric and the string length is greater than zero, it returns true.
name: IS_NUM

input.name: str
input.description: Input variable of type STRING with specified length which needs to be checked for numeric characters.

return_value.description: Returns true if the input string consists only of numeric characters and has a length greater than zero; otherwise, returns false.
